subject: [Wordfence Alert] violet-marten-793642.hostingersite.com Wordfence Upgrade not run. Please modify your .htaccess
preview: This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin at Wednesday 30th of July 2025 at 07:39:56 PM The Wordfence administrative URL for this site is: https://mets.edu

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin at Wednesday 30th of July 2025 at 07:39:56 PM
The Wordfence administrative URL for this site is: https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=Wordfence
To preserve the integrity of your website we are not running Wordfence auto-update.
You are running the LiteSpeed web server which has been known to cause a problem with Wordfence auto-update.
Please go to your website now and make a minor change to your .htaccess to fix this.
You can find out how to make this change at:
https://www.wordfence.com/help/?query=dashboard-litespeed-warning

Alternatively you can disable auto-update on your website to stop receiving this message and upgrade Wordfence manually.

NOTE: You are using the free version of Wordfence. Upgrade today:
- Receive real-time Firewall and Scan engine rule updates for protection as threats emerge
- Real-time IP Blocklist blocks the most malicious IPs from accessing your site
- Country blocking
- IP reputation monitoring
- Schedule scans to run more frequently and at optimal times
- Access to Premium Support
- Discounts for multi-year and multi-license purchases

Click here to upgrade to Wordfence Premium:
https://www.wordfence.com/zz1/wordfence-signup/
--
To change your alert options for Wordfence, visit:
https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=Wordfence&subpage=global_options
To see current Wordfence alerts, visit:
https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=Wordfence



No longer an administrator for this site? Click here to stop receiving security alerts: https://violet-marten-793642.hostingersite.com/?_wfsf=removeAlertEmail&jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6Im5vdGlmaWNhdGlvbnNAd29sZmlxLmNvbS5hdSIsIl9leHAiOjE3NTQ0NzMxOTZ9.ijs8all8DK3_JAZSSbPzrvE--giR1MZ9HL4OBzwuwnQ
